EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Ivo, We received the below email to our general information email box, I am assuming this was sent to us in error but I wanted to be sure. Please confirm. Best,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. First Name: ivoLast Name: sargesEmail: isarges@gmail.com <mailto:isarges@gmail.com>Phone:Title:Company: independent / newSubject: mgmt consulting curriculaMessage: Gary -- I am starting a business focusing on providing in-house consulting solutions to large organizations. Given your background and experience, I would love to touch base and test a few ideas. In particular, I am keen to learn more about your work on the mgmt consulting curricula (linked-in notice). Would you be available for a quick phone call? Tx, ivo.botblock: </htm
